titles: The vvedding As it was lately acted by her Maiesties Seruants, at the Phenix in Drury Lane. Written by Iames Shirley, Gent.
author: Shirley, James, 1596-1666.
publisher: Printed [by Nicholas Okes] for Iohn Groue, and are to be sold at his shop at Furniualls Inne Gate in Holborne,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
Inlaid; A4 reversed in binding; quire K misbound 1,3,2,4.
